messages.title: Labour stands for the real change Britain needs.
messages.content: You can’t trust Boris Johnson’s Tories. Only Labour can stop Boris Johnson and kick the Tories out of office.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give over 700,000 people in Scotland a pay rise by introducing a Real Living Wage of £10 an hour.
Increase funding for the NHS with more nurses and doctors to give patients the care they need.
Tackle the housing crisis by capping private sector rents and building more council houses.
Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.
Deliver £70 billion of additional funding to invest in Scotland’s people, communities and public services.
Get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say, and guaranteeing the option to Remain.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say, and guaranteeing the option to Remain.
issues.economy: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.

quotes.text: It’s time for real change – For the many, not the few

images.caption: It’s time for real change. Vote Scottish Labour
